repl_text_main_desc: Returns an ndarray containing pseudorandom numbers drawn from a hypergeometric distribution.
repl_text_assign_desc: Fills an ndarray with pseudorandom numbers drawn from a hypergeometric distribution.
repl_text_factory_desc: Returns a function for generating pseudorandom numbers drawn from a hypergeometric distribution.
repl_text_param_1_desc: Population size. If an ndarray, must be broadcast compatible with the specified array shape.
repl_text_param_2_desc: Subpopulation size. If an ndarray, must be broadcast compatible with the specified array shape.
repl_text_param_3_desc: Number of draws. If an ndarray, must be broadcast compatible with the specified array shape.
repl_text_assign_param_1_desc: Population size. If an ndarray, must be broadcast compatible with the provided output array.
repl_text_assign_param_2_desc: Subpopulation size. If an ndarray, must be broadcast compatible with the provided output array.
repl_text_assign_param_3_desc: Number of draws. If an ndarray, must be broadcast compatible with the provided output array.
